title: [CLIENT] Chroma Skins for Bots
body:
Anytime there is bot game where the bots have a chroma skin, their loading screen champion picture will just be a blue rectangle. Everytime.
1. Go in intermediate bot game
2. Get a bot that has a chroma skin of any kind
3. See blue rectangle

Occurs every time, most commonly with Lucian but can happen with others.{{champion:236}}
